description: This Cranberry Honey Butter is a deliciously creamy and sweet spread that combines the tartness of homemade cranberry sauce with the smooth richness of salted butter and a hint of natural honey.
instructions: Step 1: Gather your ingredients—all at room temperature—and place the butter, cranberry sauce, and honey into a mixing bowl. Step 2: Using an electric mixer, beat the mixture on medium speed until it just comes together and becomes smooth. Step 3: Scrape down the sides of the bowl with a spatula to ensure no lumps, then continue beating on medium-high speed until the butter is light and fluffy. Step 4: Spoon the cranberry honey butter into a small ramekin or a 4-ounce glass jar for a pretty presentation.
notes: For best results, ensure the butter is softened to room temperature to allow smooth mixing. You can substitute homemade cranberry sauce with store-bought if desired, though the homemade version offers fresher flavor.
